featured.text: You’ll 33 me by a mark on my brow.
After that sow gives birth, find the fourth piglet with a mark on its brow and, with one 34 of your knife, slaughter it.
Then the disciple 37 his knife and picked out the little pig with a mark on its brow.

definition.en_def: The forehead or the area above the eyes; also refers to the eyebrow.
definition.example: She raised her brow in surprise when she heard the news.
